title: Supreme Emperor Ling - Novel Updates
author: Xiao Henshui   萧恨水
description: When the nature is unkind, all the creatures are regarded as nothing; when the saint is unmerciful, all the people are regarded as nobody. Xiao Lingtian awakens his all-powerful destiny soul through a mysterious green lotus. From then on, he steps on a unique road. To ordain conscience for Heaven and Earth, to secure life and fortune for the people; to continue lost teachings for past sages, and to establish peace for all future generations. He swears that he will take revenge on his opponents and dominate his own life. >
